nodes.text: This individual was a male who lived in the final decades of the New Sith Wars. He met the Sith Master Finn and his apprentice on a planet for business in a building. After concluding business with the man, Finn and his apprentice exited the building and detonated the bomb they had placed in the structure, killing the man.

This man first appeared in the short comic "The Apprentice", which was featured in Star Wars Tales 17 and written by Mike Denning. The story was later compiled into a trade paperback version and republished in Star Wars Tales Volume 5. Plausible stories in Star Wars Tales 1–20 were initially viewed as S-canon until referenced in a non-Tales source, at which point the subject matter was elevated to C-canon status. Because the subject material of the comic was mentioned in Finn's, Marka's, and Lod's entries in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, this elevates the character's appearance in The Apprentice to C-canon.
